MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-DEC-2020 23:59.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:43pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 5:55pm on 8th December 2020.
